meanings.definition: The quality or state of being puggy.
meanings.sent1: Her pugginess made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The pugginess of the dough made it perfect for shaping into cookies.
meanings.sent3: The pugginess of the teddy bear's fur made it look extra cuddly.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the pugginess of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent5: The pugginess of the clay made it easy to mold into different shapes.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of resembling a pug.
meanings.sent1: The puppy's pugginess was evident in its wrinkled face.
meanings.sent2: She loved the pugginess of the little dog she saw at the park.
meanings.sent3: The pugginess of the cartoon character made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His pugginess in the costume party was a hit among the guests.
meanings.sent5: The pugginess of the stuffed toy reminded her of her childhood pet.
